attributes.action: Make all political parties collaborate to heal damage caused by the referendum.
attributes.additional_details: What the UK needs now is for all the political parties to stop infighting, come together and work collaboratively with one another to heal our country. The British people feel abandoned by the politicians from all parties at this time of national crisis and we need them to take control and restore some semblance of security and normality.
attributes.background: The EU referendum has caused a deep rift in society and left a vacuum resulting in an increase in racist attacks and a feeling of uneasiness and fear amongst the normal, hard working public. Politicians have been AWOL - too busy arguing and fighting to see the ever deepening divide in society.

rejection.details: This petition is calling for action from political parties, not the Government or Parliament.
